rules_text:
Search your library for a card. You may cast it without paying its mana cost if it's a green creature or Revelation spell with mana value X or less. Then shuffle.
Coalesce {X}{X}{G}{G}{G}{G} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard for {X}{X}{G}{G}{G}{G}. If you do, it enters as a Horror creature after it resolves. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
